com.github.shynixn.petblocks.api.business.service

Interface PetService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PetServiceImpl

    public PetService

    Created by Shynixn 2018.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PetService

        public PetService()

    • Method Detail

      • getOrSpawnPetFromPlayer

        <P> java.util.Optional<com.github.shynixn.petblocks.api.business.proxy.PetProxy> getOrSpawnPetFromPlayer(P player)

        Gets or spawns the pet of the given player. An empty optional gets returned if the pet cannot spawn by one of the following reasons: Current world, player has not got permission, region is disabled for pets, PreSpawnEvent was cancelled or Pet is not available due to Ai State. For example HealthAI defines pet ai as 0 which results into impossibility to spawn.

      • findPetByEntity

        <E> PetProxy findPetByEntity(E entity)

        Tries to find the pet from the given entity. Returns null if the pet does not exist.

      • hasPet

        <P> boolean hasPet(P player)

        Gets if the given player has got an active pet.

        See Also:
        player

      • clearPlayerResources

        <P> void clearPlayerResources(P player)

        Clears the allocated player resources. Should not be called by external plugins.
